statements: SELECT * FROM curriculum_content;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM curriculum_content;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM curriculum_content ORDER BY content_type ASC;
SELECT content_title FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_description FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM curriculum_content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_type = 'Article' OR content_type = 'Book' ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_id > 3 AND content_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM curriculum_content;
SELECT content_id, content_name FROM curriculum_content;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_description FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_title FROM lesson_plans ORDER BY plan_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_title = 'Introduction to Programming';
SELECT plan_title, plan_description FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT plan_title, plan_description FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT plan_title, plan_description FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND plan_title LIKE '%Basics%';
SELECT plan_title, plan_description FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' ORDER BY plan_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_content;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM curriculum_content;
SELECT plan_title, plan_description FROM lesson_plans;
SELECT assessment_title, assessment_date FROM assessment_data;

SELECT content_title, plan_title, assessment_title FROM curriculum_content JOIN lesson_plans ON curriculum_content.content_id = lesson_plans.content_id JOIN assessment_data ON lesson_plans.plan_id = assessment_data.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM curriculum_content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT plan_title, plan_description, assessment_date FROM lesson_plans JOIN assessment_data ON lesson_plans.plan_id = assessment_data.plan_id;

SELECT content_title, assessment_title FROM curriculum_content JOIN lesson_plans ON curriculum_content.content_id = lesson_plans.content_id JOIN assessment_data ON lesson_plans.plan_id = assessment_data.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_title LIKE 'Introduction%' ORDER BY plan_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT content_title, content_description, created_at FROM curriculum_content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_start_date, program_end_date FROM educational_programs WHERE program_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_score FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM lesson_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_created_at FROM lesson_plans ORDER BY plan_created_at DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description, content_type FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_type = 'Video';
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_start_date, program_end_date FROM educational_programs WHERE program_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessed_plan_id, assessment_score, assessment_date FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_score >= 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM teachers WHERE teacher_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT assessment_title FROM assessments WHERE assessment_description LIKE '%evaluation%';
SELECT curriculum_name, COUNT(*) AS num_lessons FROM lesson_plans GROUP BY curriculum_name;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade = '10th Grade';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE lesson_plan_id = 'b8491a80-6758-4bb0-bc32-12ee9b49376e';
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_title LIKE '%Final%';
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teachers WHERE curriculum_id = '4cdf5aad-f9c2-4b94-835d-9db4b0617801';

SELECT s.student_name, lp.lesson_plan_title, a.assessment_title FROM students s INNER JOIN lesson_plans lp ON s.lesson_plan_id = lp.lesson_plan_id INNER JOIN assessments a ON lp.lesson_plan_id = a.lesson_plan_id;
